net.proteusframework.cms.support

Class HTMLPageElementUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.support.HTMLPageElementUtil

  • public final class HTMLPageElementUtil
extends Object
    Utility for HTML page elements.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • getPageTitle

        @Nullable
public static String getPageTitle(CmsRequest<?> request,
                           boolean includeTitleAffix)
        Get the localized page title. This doesn't include any request/response specific information such as CmsResponse.getPageTitles().
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        includeTitleAffix - flag to include title affix.
        Returns:
        the text or null if not available.

      • getPageTitle

                           Page page,

        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        page - the page.
        includeTitleAffix - flag to include title affix.
        Returns:
        the text or null if not available.

      • isWebContentType

        public static boolean isWebContentType(ContentType contentType)
        Test if the specified content type is common web based content.

        By default this does "text/*", "application/xhtml+xml", and "application/xml". This does not handle RSS/Atom (purposefully).

        Parameters:
        contentType - the content type.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • isWebSyndicationContentType

        public static boolean isWebSyndicationContentType(ContentType contentType)
        Test if the specified content type is a web syndication content type: RSS / Atom.
        Parameters:
        contentType - the content type.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • isXMLContentType

        public static boolean isXMLContentType(ContentType ct)
        Return true if the content type is xml. If the content type is the content type of the request, then CmsRequest.isRequestForXmlContent() is preferred since it caches the result.
        Parameters:
        ct - the content type.
        Returns:
        true or false;

      • isXMLContentType

        public static boolean isXMLContentType(String ct)
        Return true if the content type is xml. If the content type is the content type of the request, then CmsRequest.isRequestForXmlContent() is preferred since it caches the result.
        Parameters:
        ct - the content type.
        Returns:
        true or false;

        ndes - optional list of NDEs.

@Nullable
public static String stripJSessionID(String url)
        Strip the jsessionid from a URL.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
